mapper.select:
select id,c.customizetime,c.goodscode,printchart,printstatus,createtime from t_customize c
and ( c.goodscode like concat('%',#{cq.keyword},'%') or c.customizetime like concat('%',#{cq.keyword},'%') )
mapper.sql: id, customizetime, goodscode, printchart, printstatus, createtime
mapper.insert:
insert into t_customize
id,
customizetime,
goodscode,
printchart,
printstatus,
createtime,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{customizetime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{printchart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{printstatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update t_customize
customizetime = #{customizetime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goodscode = #{goodscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
printchart = #{printchart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
printstatus = #{printstatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_customize set customizetime = #{customizetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goodscode = #{goodscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, printchart = #{printchart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, printstatus = #{printstatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
